products.title: Splash Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. This elegant cream coloured elecrtric roller blind will make a wonderful additon to any room and will compliment wooden tones throughtout the home. Electric roller blinds work perfectly for more difficult to reach windows & can provide the perfect finishing touch when dressing a window. With a 5 year guarantee on all their products, you can rest assured that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Frost Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash frost elecrtic roller blinds are a beautiful, fresh & crisp white colour. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). Splash frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Voile Fr Sandshell Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their voile fr fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. Durable and stylish, this translucent cream electric roller blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream electric roller blind is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. Electric roller blinds are ideal due to their child-safe cordless design, eco-friendly charging options, and can integrate with google home hub and amazon alexa devices, just choose their smart hub when ordering.

products.title: Voile Fr Sage Green Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This mint green electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their voile sage green electric roller fabric is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.
